pages.text: $(li)The Bombs are a new range weapon that explodes on impact and does not break blocks.$(br)$(li)They make 11 hearts of damage for every hit.

$(li)The Blue Bombs are a very poweful version of the Bombs. $(br)$(li)They deals 35-75 hearts of damage approximately and they Burn and inflicts Weakness effect too.$(br)$(li)They only can be found in naturally generated Chests.
